sub_title: Agile HR Lead / Principal Stafmanager @ Randstad Groep Nederland (IT)
summary:
My specialties are HR consultancy, talent acquisition- and management, recruitment, contract management, change- and process management, people- and performance management and sales- and account management. During my career I have always had roles in which all of these specialties where combined. 

In my current role I am developing my change management skills by joining relevant training, education and (peer-to-peer) coaching. This applies to the Agile way of working as well. Obviously I practice a lot on the job. I am also learning a lot about our new generation and about how to lead talent in this digital age.

In addition, I am a hard worker with a flexible mentality. I don’t mind to take that extra effort and I love challenges. I am result driven, without losing sight of the people around me. My strength lies in building (new) relationships, looking for cooperation, and really connect with people. As a colleague and as a manager, I get people moving. 
In addition, I am solution-oriented and creative, and I work in an Agile way, which allows me to build, implement and optimize new processes easily, ultimately shaping change in an efficient and effective way. As a result, I manage to improve the performance of myself, my colleagues and the organization. Furthermore, I am enthusiastic with a positive attitude and I know how to motivate and inspire others.

profile_positions.description:
As part of the leadership team, consisting of 2 Agile HR leads, a principal scrum master, a solution architect and the ICT director, I am HR responsible for the online teams within the Talent domain. These teams build and develop all online functionalities and applications and optimize the user experience for our talents on the websites of Randstad, Tempo Team and Yacht (and BMC & Ausy). 

My focus is on onboarding, coaching and personal development of employees. I also act as a connector between the various stakeholders within the organization, such as our HR Business Partner, Scrum masters, product owners, chapter leads, the management team, Talent Acquisition and suppliers.
I take part in the further development of our IT organization from an HR and organizational perspective. In addition, I contribute to the success of the Talent domain and the total RGN IT organization by making the translation to a roadmap for the Talent domain, based on the vision and mission of Randstad Groep Nederland, RGN IT and my expertise. My portfolio also includes strategic personnel planning for the Talent domain and the coordination of this within RGN IT.
 
I am also part of the Agile Leads Chapter and I work closely with our HR department regarding the needs of the teams. Furthermore, I am involved in optimizing processes, helping to shape the IT curriculum and rolling out the (Agile) Way of Working and mindset. The latter is mainly aimed at stimulating self-reliance and self-management within the teams according to the Agile Manifesto.
profile_positions.title: Agile HR Lead / Principal Stafmanager

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was, together with my team, responsible for implementing and managing the recruitment process for the alternative work force at Randstad Groep Nederland IT.  I operated on an operational, tactical and strategic level as a single point of contact. 
My scope of managing the day-to-day business was:
- recruitment & proactive talent management 
- vendor management
- process management 
- compliance & risk management
- reports, analysis and quality measurements
- information and (legal) HR advise
profile_positions.title: Principal consultant on site @ Randstad Groep Nederland IT (via Yacht Inhouse Services)

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was, together with my team, responsible for implementing and managing the recruitment process for the alternative work force at Randstad Digital Factory, the Global IT department of Randstad. I operated on an operational, tactical and strategic level as a single point of contact. 
My scope of managing the day-to-day business was:
- recruitment & proactive talent management 
- vendor management
- process management 
- compliance & risk management
- reports, analysis and quality measurements
- information and (legal) HR advise
profile_positions.title: Principal consultant on site @ Randstad Digital Factory (via Yacht Inhouse Services)

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was responsible for putting in place and optimizing the sourcing and recruitment process for the Alternative Work Force of Rabobank Netherlands at Yacht Externen Management. YEM is one of three brokers contracted by Rabobank. Main focus was establishing growth by excellent, professional vendor management. In addition I advised Rabobank on how to improve or change their internal processes regarding this subject, to create more efficiency and shorter turnround time. Building and and keeping a good relationship with our vendors and the recruitment department of Rabobank was key in my role.  Result? Besides a happy customer and happy vendors:
Revenue growth: 61%
Profit growth: 153%
profile_positions.title: Relationshipmanager @ Rabobank Netherlands (via Yacht Externen Management)

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was responsible for the setting up and managing the recruitment process for the alternative work force at Nasper's HQ in Hoofddorp. Also, I worked complimentary to Nasper's Talent Acquisition Team in Dubai, by recruiting professionals for their permanent positions in Hoofddorp. I operated on an operational, tactical and strategic level as a single point of contact.
My scope of managing the day-to-day business was:
- recruitment & proactive talent management 
- vendor management
- process management regarding hour registration and invoicing
- compliance & risk management
- reports, analysis and quality measurements
- information and (legal) HR advise
profile_positions.title: Principal consultant on site @ Naspers Group (via Yacht Inhouse Services)

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was responsible for the setting up and managing the recruitment process for the alternative work force at Optiver's HQ in Amsterdam.  I operated on an operational, tactical and strategic level as a single point of contact.
My scope of managing the day-to-day business was:
- recruitment & proactive talent management 
- vendor management
- process management regarding hour registration and invoicing
- compliance & risk management
- reports, analysis and quality measurements
- information and (legal) HR advise
profile_positions.title: Principal consultant on site @ Optiver (via Yacht Inhouse Services)

profile_positions.description:
I started in this role after a merger of all professionals labels within Randstad Groep Nederland. Since I was already working in the government sector at the time, this seemed to be the logical first step into this new company. As a Recruitment consultant I was responsible for the recruitment of  professionals for our large clients, mainly municipalities, in the north and east region of the Netherlands (blue area in attached picture). My client portfolio consisted of the following municipalities:
Groningen, Leeuwarden, Emmen, Lelystad,  Apeldoorn, Deventer, Zutphen, Doetinchem, Arnhem (and surrounding smaller municipalities), Ede, Veenendaal, Nijmegen, Almelo, Hengelo and Enschede .                            
In addition to these municipalities, some of the larger provinces, the Municipal Health Services (GGD) and the Social Benefits Agency (UWV) where clients I recruited for.
profile_positions.title: Principal Recruitment Consultant Public @ Yacht

profile_positions.description:
Int this 360 degree role I was responsible for the growth of Randstad Professionals in the Public market in the east region of the Netherlands. My scope was:
- sales management
- recruitment of professionals in the government sector
- HR management for our professionals
- managing administrative processes 
In this role entrepeneurship and proactivity were essential. Especially since this was a totally new market for me. As a sales manager I extended my network by building new relationships with new clients and candidates. I acquired new interesting assignments and jobs at organisations like the police force, the courthouse, highschools and  municipalities. As a recruiter I searched and selected the best government professionals to match to the acquired assignments. Furthermore I provided optimal guidance for our professionals and an efficient and correct administration.
profile_positions.title: Principal Consultant Public @ Randstad Professionals

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was responsible for the large accounts of  Randstad Professionals in the North-West region of the Netherlands. This was an integrated management role in which I was also HR responsible for two direct reports and about 60 interim professionals working on site at with our clients. The scope was about EUR 6M. In addition, I was responsible for the acquisition of prospect accounts with a potential of EUR 1M+. In 2013 I acquired two new clients that both had a challenge regarding the recruitment of scarce profiles and the processes around their Alternative Work Force. (EUR 9M potential). 
Since I was working with large accounts, my scope of managing the day-to-day business was:
- recruitment & proactive talent management (in sales, marketing, IT, finance, HR and facilities)
- vendor management
- process management regarding hour registration and invoicing
- compliance & risk management
- reports, analysis and quality measurements
- information and (legal) HR advise
Furthermore I was regularly involved in different internal projects at Randstad, like organizing the National Career Fair at the RAI in Amsterdam, The Week of the Entrepreneur at the Jaarbeurs in Utrecht and a project with our internal Marketing department to reload the Professionals brand in the Dutch market.
profile_positions.title: Managing Consultant Large Accounts @ Randstad Professionals

profile_positions.description: During this period I created, implemented and built an in-house concept (MSP) for Randstad Professionals at the eBay office in the Netherlands. I was responsible for managing the Alternative Workforce. This means managing and improving the whole process around hiring of professionals, with an emphasis on Dutch law, compliance and employee satisfaction. (International) relationship management and negotiations with eBay as well as the different suppliers was also my responsability. Furthermore, I was the recruiter of specialists, mainly in Sales, Marketing and IT. Since help was needed in other countries as well, I set up cooperation between Randstad Professionals and eBay in Sweden, Denmark, Switzerland, the UK, Spain, Italy, the Czech Republic and Poland.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant @ eBay Classifieds Group

profile_positions.description: Relationship Management and Sales in the IT market. Building my own candidate database through an extensive recruitment and selection process. Management of 25-40 interim professionals including their personal career plans. Expansion of my internal and external network and knowledge by attending IT network meetings and IT fairs. During this year I placed 40 IT Professionals at different companies.
profile_positions.title: Consultant IT Services @ Randstad Professionals

profile_positions.description: Responsible for an in-house team of 4 FTE and a sales team of 2 FTE and 280 customer service representatives. Revenue responsibility of EUR 7m. Responsible for reporting into HR, Procurement and the Managing Director Customer Service regarding recruitment, transfers and departures (or exits) at the contact center at Telfort. In addition the quality of the CSR’s and our services and partnership where monthly and quarterly reviewed. During this period my team also started relationships and cooperation with other (smaller) departments at Telfort which created extra revenue of EUR 1m a year. My team managed to increase the commitment and duration of stay of the CS population by successfully executing a project in cooperation with Telfort. During this period I successfully completed the Management Potential Program of Randstad Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Area Manager @ Randstad Callflex

profile_positions.description:
As a senior accountspecialist my responsability besides managing the relationship with people on all levels within the Telfort Customer Service, was recruitment, guidance and talent management of all our 280 employees working there. 
Focus was on quality of candidates, but also training & development of our employees, to help Telfort with giving the best customer experience possible. In this role I also managed to optimize our internal processes, which helped us to work more efficient and perform better. One of the biggest successes was that we built a relationship with our client, in which we didn't just work together, but had a genuine partnership, which was my personal goal.
profile_positions.title: Senior Account Specialist @  (& Management Potential) @ Telfort
